Package org.cbrnrd.alertfx

AlertFX generalizes the common types of Dialogs and Alerts in JavaFX.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoiceBox
    Has the user choose between multiple choice buttons (list)
    ConfirmExit
    Custom alert to confirm the exiting of a program
    ErrorBox
    Display an error message with a stack trace
    MsgBox
    Shows a general, customizable message box
    Prompt
    Gets the users input from a TextField
    QuestionBox

Package org.cbrnrd.alertfx Description

AlertFX generalizes the common types of Dialogs and Alerts in JavaFX. The minimal effort message box looks like so: 

     MsgBox msgBox = new MsgBox("Message");
     msgBox.show();
That's it!

Custom CSS can be applied to any alert with applyCss("path") where "path" is the path to your CSS file. Be sure that your css sets styles for DialogPane or it will not work!
